title: UIText

properties.name: display
properties.description: Either none or flex. Defaults to flex.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color of the view. Can be hex (eg #000000) or rgba (eg rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)). Defaults to null.

properties.name: borderRadius
properties.description: The radius of the border in pixels.

properties.name: margin
properties.description: The outer margin of the view in pixels. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: padding
properties.description: The inner padding of the view in pixels. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: fontSize
properties.description: The font size in pixels. Defaults to 16.

properties.name: textAlign
properties.description: Options: left, center, right. Defaults to left.

properties.name: fontWeight
properties.description: Defaults to normal, can also be a number like 100 or string like bold.

snippets.name: Create UIText
snippets.description: Create a basic UIText with default settings
snippets.code:
const text = app.create('UIText', {
  value: 'Hello world',
  fontSize: 16,
  color: '#000000',
  textAlign: 'left'
})
app.add(text)

snippets.name: UIText with Background
snippets.description: Create a UIText with a background color
snippets.code:
const text = app.create('UIText', {
  value: 'Hello world',
  fontSize: 16,
  color: '#FFFFFF',
  backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)',
  borderRadius: 10
})
app.add(text)

snippets.name: UIText with Margin and Padding
snippets.description: Create a UIText with margin and padding
snippets.code:
